original_text: Then God's court will be ready to judge him. He will lose his authority to rule as king. That will be the end of his kingdom for ever! 7: Then God's court will be ready to judge him. He will lose his authority to rule as king. That will be the end of his kingdom for ever!
korean_text: 그러나 심판이 시작되면 그는 권세를 빼앗기고 완전히 멸망할 것이요

sentences.original_text: Then God's court will be ready to judge him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 하나님의 법정이 그를 심판하기 위해 준비될 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: He will lose his authority to rule as king.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 왕으로 다스릴 권위를 잃을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: That will be the end of his kingdom for ever!
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 그의 왕국의 영원한 끝이 될 것입니다!

sentences.original_text: Then God's court will be ready to judge him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 하나님의 법정이 그를 심판하기 위해 준비될 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: He will lose his authority to rule as king.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 왕으로 다스릴 권위를 잃을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: That will be the end of his kingdom for ever!
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 그의 왕국의 영원한 끝이 될 것입니다!
